description.originalText: Martha was our nanny for 6 years and was with us through the birth and raising of our 3 kids (now 8, 5 and 2). The children love her and we still visit her today. She’s reliable and trustworthy. She knows everything about children. She is proactive with coordinating educational activities at the libraries, setting up playdates and fostering a loving environment. I knew the second I left the door I didn’t have to worry and trusted her to even take the kids on public transportation throughout the city as needed. She’s the only one that would get my picky 5 year old to eat healthy. Healthy and nutritious living is super important to her. She taught me so much about being a mom and really helped me along my journey. I would hire her again and trust her wholeheartedly.

description.displayText: Martha worked for our family for over a year.  She cared for our son and did an exceptional job.  We really loved Martha and were very sad to let her go.  We relocated and I stopped working.  She really is a wonderful caregiver and loves her job.  We fully recommend her.
description.originalText: Martha worked for our family for over a year.  She cared for our son and did an exceptional job.  We really loved Martha and were very sad to let her go.  We relocated and I stopped working.  She really is a wonderful caregiver and loves her job.  We fully recommend her.

description.displayText: Martha is a terrific nanny, a wonderful mother and a great person. She worked for us as a full time nanny for a year until our daughter was ready to go to nursery school, and then continued to work for us part time and as an occasional babysitter. As an employee she is responsible, hard-working, personable, reliable and honest. I can't praise her enough as a nanny. She is warm, loving and nurturing, and also experienced and smart. My daughter loves her to pieces. We, on our part, know that our daughter is in good hands - capable and truly caring hands. Martha knows how to raise children, how to care for them and educate them - in short, she knows how to be a good mother. We feel we can trust her judgment and instincts in any situation, and feel blessed that we found someone so capable and loving to take care of our daughter.
